```python
import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

def query(s1, s2):
    print(s1)
    print(s2)
    sys.stdout.flush()
    result = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
    return result

for i in range(1, n + 1):
    s1 = '.' * i
    s2 = '.' * i
    result = query(s1, s2)
    if result == 'end':
        break
    if result == 'T':
        for j in range(i +1, n+1):
            s1 = '.' * (j)
            s2 = '.' * (j)
            result = query(s1,s2)
            if result == 'end':
                break
        break
    
    
    
    

```
